channel.title: Touchscreens on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Touchscreens on My New Hugo Site

item.title: An Early Touchpoint
item.description: [whitebox] [big]Today in Tedium: There was once a time when I worked in graphic design—mostly in newspapers—and as a result of that, I owned a tablet. For drawing, of course. It didn’t have a screen. I wasn’t a great artist by any means, but that little Wacom device was a nice functionality add when I was tweaking cutouts and hopping into Photoshop or Illustrator. (I’m pretty good at cutouts if I do say so myself.
